actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on certain yttrium bearing materials and compounds.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on yttrium bearing materials and compounds containing by weight between 19 percent and 85 percent yttrium oxide equivalent.

titles.title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on certain yttrium bearing materials and compounds.
